mapper.update:
update tbl_privilege_acl
release_id = #{releaseId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
release_sn = #{releaseSn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
system_sn = #{systemSn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
module_sn = #{moduleSn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
module_id = #{moduleId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
acl_state = #{aclState,jdbcType=INTEGER},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
updator = #{updator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
del_flag = #{delFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER}
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT t3.module_id AS moduleId FROM tbl_privilege_acl t1 INNER JOIN tbl_privilege_role t2 ON t1.release_id=t2.id WHERE t1.release_sn='role' AND t1.acl_state&2>0 AND t1.release_id IN (${value})

SELECT DISTINCT t3.module_id AS moduleId FROM tbl_privilege_acl t1 INNER JOIN tbl_privilege_user t2 ON t1.release_id=t2.id WHERE t1.release_sn='user' AND t1.acl_state&2>0 AND t1.release_id = #{userId}

SELECT DISTINCT t1.id, t1.release_id, t1.release_sn, t1.system_sn, t1.module_sn, t1.module_id, t1.acl_state FROM tbl_privilege_acl t1 INNER JOIN tbl_privilege_role t2 ON t1.release_id=t2.id WHERE t1.release_sn='role' AND t1.release_id=#{roleId}
and t1.system_sn = #{systemSn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

and t1.system_sn = #{systemSn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
